metadata.synopsis: One liner of a client in Sorcerous Sundries who is panic-buying.

0.speaker: Lester Farrower
0.text: Perhaps you can swap garlic for bloodstaunch? Worst case scenario you just wouldn't stop bleeding. And stink.
0.context: NodeContext: Preoccupied with his thoughts/thinking aloud

1.speaker: Lester Farrower
1.text: One moment - I'm trying to work out how many pinches of mugwort is equivalent to one of mothersleaf...
1.context: NodeContext: Preoccupied with his thoughts/working out the maths
